import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NavigationEnd, Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-menu', templateUrl: './nav-menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-menu.component.css'] }) export class NavMenuComponent { isExpanded = false; constructor(private router: Router) { this.router.events.subscribe((ev) => { if (ev instanceof NavigationEnd) { this.collapse()} }); } collapse() { this.isExpanded = false; } toggle() { this.isExpanded = !this.isExpanded; } clickHamburger() { } }
